login.redirectNote: You'll be redirected back to {{returnTo}} after signing in.

errors.passwordShort: Password must be at least 6 characters.
errors.missingEmailReset: Enter your email to reset your password.
errors.missingEmailResend: Enter your email to resend the confirmation email.

info.checkEmail: Check your email to confirm your account, then come back to sign in.
info.resetEmailSent: Password reset email sent. Follow the link to create a new password.
info.confirmationResent: Confirmation email resent. Check your inbox to finish signing up.

library.title: Task Library
library.subtitle: Choose a deliberate practice task and refine micro-skills with guided feedback.
library.noResults: No tasks found. Try a different search.

history.title: Practice history
history.subtitle: Track your progress across tasks and revisit past coaching highlights.
history.empty: No attempts yet. Start a practice session.

profile.title: Account overview
profile.subtitle: Manage your identity and review account status in one place.
profile.error: We couldn't load your profile. Try again.
profile.actionsSubtitle: Sign out on shared devices or when you're done practicing.

settings.title: Practice settings
settings.subtitle: Tune your AI stack, privacy defaults, and OpenAI credentials for the best practice flow.
settings.error: We couldn't load your settings. Try again.

aiMode.label: AI mode
aiMode.helper: Choose how we prioritize local inference versus OpenAI during practice.

localStt.label: Local STT endpoint
localStt.helper: Used when local STT is selected.

localLlm.label: Local LLM endpoint
localLlm.helper: Used when local LLM is selected.

storeAudio.label: Store audio recordings
storeAudio.helper: Save audio clips alongside attempts for future review.

status.saveError: We couldn't save your settings. Try again.

openAi.title: OpenAI API key
openAi.connected: Your key is connected and ready for OpenAI calls.
openAi.disconnected: Connect your key to unlock OpenAI-powered practice.

keyStatus.missing: Add an OpenAI key to connect.
keyStatus.saveError: We couldn't save that key. Double-check and try again.
keyStatus.removeError: We couldn't remove the key. Try again.

openAi.confirmRemove: Remove your stored OpenAI key? This cannot be undone.

validateStatus.missing: Add a key (or save one first) before validating.
validateStatus.valid: Key is valid and ready for practice.
validateStatus.error: Unable to validate the key right now.

openAi.securityNote: Keys are encrypted at rest and never shared back to the browser after saving.

practice.title: Practice session
practice.transcriptPlaceholder: Your transcript will appear here after evaluation.

error.noAudio: No audio captured. Please record again.
error.evaluateFailed: Unable to evaluate response. Please try again.
error.sessionFailed: Unable to start a practice session. Please refresh.

admin.title: Admin Library
admin.subtitle: Parse new tasks with OpenAI, edit content, and import into the library.

createFromText.title: Create from free text
createFromText.subtitle: Paste source text or provide a URL to parse.

edit.title: Edit existing task
edit.subtitle: Select a task from the list to update metadata and content.
